content:
This is more of a general tip for the moderation team to maybe adjust the bot and for any users posting Twitter videos because not everyone can watch videos on Twitter:

- Add "fixv" in front of x.com to make videos show up on Discord directly
- Add "vx" in front of twitter.com to make videos show up on Discore directly
Hi <@191632562483888129> TY this is a really nice tip. I don't know if we can automate it tho. We have a simple setup, folks just paste links and Discord does it's thing. I will look into it.
yeah there are lots of these sorts of link fixers; I'm also aware of fixupx for x and fxtwitter for twitter
also for other sites: ddinstagram for instagram, cbsky for bsky, and vxtiktok for tiktok
Right. We want to avoid adding too much external elements because they don't aways play well together.
Is there a fix for showing a post's preview instead of a FB login?
I haven't come across one of those yet

Not a good idea, because the OE Team's mission is to amplify OFF-Discord.  While these fixers embed videos in Discord, volunteers will copy the "fixed" URL to paste into another platform where those fixers may break the pasted video.
Good to know. We will continue to supporting the existing method for sharing videos.
